entry.title: [GRA/BHS/DE/VA][Public Cloud] - Registries upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Mar 5, 23:21 UTC

Start time : 16/04/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/04/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The upgrade of the Harbor version will set Harbor in read-only mode (only pull will be allowed) for 1 or 2mn.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of registries.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA11][Public Cloud] - Internal databases update
entry.content:
Mar 19, 20:52 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 19/03/2025 20:50 UTC.

Mar 19, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 12, 15:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled for update the Internal databases on GRA11 region.

Start time : 19/03/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 19/03/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : The API service may be unavailable during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are upgrading the database behind OpenStack Neutron API on GRA11 region.
During that period, the API may be slower and not answering at all.
Your instances, routers, load balancers, networks or any other existing OpenStack components are NOT affected.
Only creation, update or deletion could be affected.

Thank you for your understanding.

Mar 14, 11:25 UTC

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The situation has largely stabilised, order and maintenance are now being processed for most of the service.
Ongoing Actions : We are now finishing fixing last services.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 13, 14:05 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Databases offer on the specific GRA region.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 12/03/2025 10:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The databases service is currently experiencing processing delays regarding orders, maintenance operations, and updates.
Customers Impact : Clients may experience processing delays with the following database services:
Cassandra, M3 Aggregator, M3DB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Caching, Grafana, Kafka, Kafka Connect, Kafka MirrorMaker, and OpenSearch.
Root Cause : This incident is related to : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/71zl4s7frl96
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

The network traffic has returned to a nominal condition.

We thank you for your patience during the course of this incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
